A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney should retitle this: \"Star Wars: Running Out of Gas.\" Visually stunning\, but \"Last Jedi\" is a disjointed\, plodding story with a bizarre characterization of Luke (Quoting Mark Hamill: \"He's not my Luke Skywalker\"). Two and a half hours about running low on fuel and whether the Jedi should exist ... Time to watch \"Rogue One\" again to cleanse the palate.
